title: The Next Storyline
author: JGray
text:
After much consideration and a bit of advice, I've decided to postpone the next storyline. Originally, my intent was to follow chapter 3 with a chapter devoted to exploring Chrys and Theresa's relationship. Instead, I've decided that the origin story on the arcana themselves needs to be explored. It is time ya'll got a chance to learn it. So, next chapter?

THE ORIGIN OF EVERYTHING!

The title's a work in progress.

replies.author: TC*Guest*
replies.text: Oh good.  Always a good thing to expand your universe before focusing in on the main characters again.  Don't want to make the story feel rushed. =)

replies.author: Faceless Minion*Guest*
replies.text:
I'd say the exact opposite, myself...  There's nothing "rushed" about dealing with the main characters interacting again, after months they're both still on horrible side-quests. 

I really can't remotely understand a desire to do this when the entire sidequest series has pretty much been a large tease and waiting game for any more time dealing with them.

replies.author: JGray
replies.text: Its only been two months. I hope the sidequests haven't been that horrible... this week, though, we deal more with the problems between Chrys and Theresa.
